properties.name: stripe.secret.key
properties.description: Stripe API secret key for server-side operations.

properties.name: stripe.publishable.key
properties.description: Stripe API publishable key for client-side operations.

properties.name: stripe.mock.enabled
properties.description: Enable mock mode for Stripe (for testing without real API).

properties.name: stripe.webhook.secret
properties.description: Stripe webhook signing secret for event verification.

properties.name: app.client.url
properties.description: Client application base URL for redirects and CORS.
